title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Developed Campgrounds
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Developed Campgrounds              Developed Campgrounds         Dingmans Campground NPS Photo  Dingmans Campground (open April to October)  1006 Rt. 209, Dingmans Ferry PA 18328  (570) 828-1551 or (877) 828-1551  133 wooded and river's edge campsites, some with electric and water hookups; group campsites available for 20 to 40 people; visit the Dingmans Campground website for current rates; reservations recommended for weekend stays.  Mohican Outdoor Center (open year-round)  50 Camp Road, Blairstown, NJ 07825  Reservations: 603-466-2727  Lodge Office: 908-362-5670  11 primitive walk-in campsites in a wooded setting;group campsites available; drinking water available; visit the Mohican Outdoor Center website for current rates and reservations; reservations recommended.  Worthington State Forest Campground (open April to December)  HC 2 Box 2, Old Mine Road, Columbia NJ 07823  Reservations: (855) 607-3075  Park Office: (908) 841-9575  69 primitive campsites in a wooded setting and some along the river; drinking water available; visit the Worthington State Forest website for current rates and reservations; reservations recommended for weekend stays.
